extendedInfo.description: Now control all your PC games with your Android phone. Steer the car with the motion sensor or shoot enemies with the touchscreen mouse control. Easy to use and fully functional. Ergonomically designed screen boasts of a touch-pad, a joystick, 5-button pad and dedicated mouse buttons. Even the volume keys are mapped with keyboard buttons.Profiles - profiles let's you map on screen controls with keyboard button, so that you don't have to change control of the game.Connection - One time activity that defines how to connect to the PC - either via WiFi or Bluetooth.Note : The server is included in the app. Tap 'Run Setup' on the homescreen and then tap 'Transfer to PC' or 'Save to SD Card' button.  - Open the transferred exe file and if firewall prompt appears click both PUBLIC and PRIVATE networks. - That's it the server appears in the bottom right tray.Keywords: PC games, control , PC, desktop, Motion gaming, motion control, accelerometer, acceler-o-meter, mouse, joystick, xbox 360, ps3, analog stick, control PC games with android, keyboard, game controller

reviews.title: firewall
reviews.comment: i turn my firewall off and it still says \"please check your firewall settings\" i dont understand this at all. same thing happens when i turn it back on. help please.
reviews.author: Joe Shmoe

reviews.title: I needs help
reviews.comment: I can\'t figure out how to create buttons for clicking, or moving the mouse. Otherwise, seems like a good app
reviews.author: Dylan Punter

reviews.title: I love it.
reviews.comment: Makes it so easy to play shooting games or even more on my Samsung Exhibit 2! Only thing I can say is an issue is the position of the buttons and analog. It would be nice if we could resize or re position the buttons for a more comfortable feel of the phone. Keep it up!.
reviews.author: joshua hines

reviews.title: Awsome.....but...
reviews.comment: Samsung galaxy tab 2 10.1  Its awsome app...but we can not set the controller layout..please fix the layout for tab specially for tab 10.1...the motion sensor is opposite....but fun to play...more options should be display for customizing layout...please send the latest version...plaese fix...

reviews.title: So cooll
reviews.comment: Im using samsung galaxy young and windows 7 on my PC, accelerometer and analog pad works perfectly. Keep up the good job guys :) .

reviews.title: NOT WORKING
reviews.comment: The server application on PC crashes as soon as i try to connect my phone to it.. Please help!! Waited for a long time for such a simple app and now its not working... :(
reviews.author: Rishabh Jain

reviews.title: Great but missing a few things
reviews.comment: Looked for ages for an app with accelerometer usage :D all thats missing is the ability to move buttons to prefered places, adding new buttons and maybe even a second analog stick and this is a dream come true!
reviews.author: Primal Rayan

reviews.title: Simple and well thought out!
reviews.comment: Unlike most other gamepad apps the mouse is separate. This is the first app that includes the mouse cursor in the background giving me more control than a regular gamepad. The accelerometer and volume keys are also a plus.  One of the best parts about this app is that the server runs without any installation or having to write files into the registry.  Only addition I would like to see is having the pc detect combinations after the last button is pressed or assigning a whole new key to multiple buttons.
reviews.author: Basell Yousef

reviews.title: Where is the link for the server?
reviews.comment: Where can I find the PC side server for AndroG. Cant find it on google, and nothing of the kind in the app itself.
